body:
Thank you very much for your quich responses!


The windows error appears while the calculation with --dcts --x options is running and it says 
"Gendaylit.exe has stopped working. Windows is going to look for a problem solution".


I´m using OpenStudio 0.8.1 and Windows 7 Professional.


Looking forward to hear from you!


Silvia
